synopsis.text: Looking to celebrate their first anniversary in the idol industry with a live tour for their devoted fans, IDOLiSH7 finds themselves busier than ever. As reigning champions of the prestigious Black or White event, they must gear up to face new challengers, with their biggest rival, TRIGGER, eagerly waiting in the wings. Amidst the whirlwind of concerts, rehearsals, and encounters with influential industry figures, the group becomes entangled in a scandalous rumor that threatens to tarnish their image. With their unity and trust put to the ultimate test, IDOLiSH7 must navigate the cutthroat world of entertainment and outwit a sinister force lurking in the shadows, all while proving they still have what it takes to remain on top. This thrilling third season of IDOLiSH7 promises even more drama, music, and heart-pounding moments as the idols strive to protect their reputation and strengthen their bonds.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
